oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Letter from Rt. Rev. E. P. Dandridge to John Sloan
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Hand-written letter dated May 16, 1960. Rt. Rev. E. P. Dandridge writes to congratulate John Sloan, owner of Cain-Sloan Department Store on his decision to integrate the store's lunch counters.
Rt. Rev. Edmund Pendleton Dandridge, was the 5th Bishop of the Episcopal Diocese of Tennessee.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Rt. Rev. Edmund Pendleton Dandridge
oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Civil rights demonstrations; Civil rights demonstrations - Tennessee - Nashville; African Americans - Civil rights - Tennessee - Nashville; Sit-ins (Civil rights); Civil rights movements;
